column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////One of my favorite places in the city. Excellent food and many choices to keep everyone happy. The wine is good
column2: the sangria is really good. I've only been for brunch once and I'd go back for sure. I would definitely make a reservation if possible as it's always packed. Otherwise you end up waiting or trying snag a bar seat. We can go here without getting the beef skewer with horseradish cream. It's my favorite thing on the menu.
